overview: tamara has no idea if to stop or continue her unplanned pregnancy. An odd coach directs her to stay for 3 days alone in the wilderness in order to get the right descition. will Tamara succeed to solve her dilemma? is the coach an idiot or wize instru tor? when things take a twist or two, these questiones are answered 'with a grain of salt'...
title: Woman in the Valley
